title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5008.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5008.1 - Definitions

State Regulations

The following definitions apply to this Part. (a) Lotto means a lottery game that has a
designated field of consecutive whole numbers beginning with 1 and ending with
59 from which a player may select up to 6 numbers. (b) Prize pool or winning pool means a
percentage of the gross sales, as may be determined by the commission, for a
particular Lotto game that is allocated for the purpose of paying prizes for
that drawing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5008.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
